thread.title: Mrs Gillian Kane
thread.title_full: Life Style Sports reviewed by Mrs Gillian Kane

author: Mrs Gillian Kane
title: Mrs Gillian Kane
text: Never got message that boots had arrived in shop apparently they were there since Friday 10th Feb and I rang shop on Monday the 13th Feb to be told they had arrived told the girl that I did not relieve any notification apparently I wasn't the only one.
